item.description:
Hey All,

Let's climb at the Boston Rock Gym (BRG)!

James D will be running the show. :)

You have to have passed a belay test at BRG to climb. If you are new, it's best to take a lesson at BRG. Please call them in advance to arrange a lesson. Also, it's best to group together in front of the television to find each other. If you are late, it gets harder.

Enjoy!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the tall guy with some sort of facial hair and a red star on his shirt.
item.name: Climbing fun at BRG!
